data.title: 2% Milk
data.description: Fresh, wholesome milk… naturally from Neilson.Since 1893, Neilson has stood for high quality dairy products. Neilson has always been committed to using the best ingredients, people and processes to produce great tasting quality milk you can depend on. Always fresh, always delicious and always an excellent source of calcium, protein and vitamin D.

data.title: Milk 2% M.F
data.description:
We are driven by a simple belief: we can always make the world better. Proper nourishment allows us all to grow and thrive. All our milk flows through soft filters to concentrate protein while filtering out half of the natural sugars. Our delicious fairlife ultra-filtered milk has 50% less sugar and 50% more protein than regular chocolate milk. Plus, there are no artificial growth hormones used and it's lactose-free. So sip, drink, and chug as you enjoy our delicious ultra-filtered milk, eh?

  • Made with 100% quality Canadian milk
  • 50% less sugar and 50% more protein than regular chocolate milk
  • Delicious, satisfying, and lactose-free
  • No artificial growth hormones used

data.title: Lactose Free 2% Dairy Product
data.description: Through our unique process, we can preserve the deliciously pure taste of fresh milk in every glass of our products, while removing the lactose that can cause you discomfort. So you can once again benefit from an excellent source of calcium, vitamin D and protein, plus a source of vitamin A. That’s everything you need to maintain a well-balanced diet.

data.title: Peaches & Cream Flavour Instant Oatmeal
data.description:
Let Quaker transport you to warm summer orchards and bright sunny days. Bursting with the sweet taste of ripe peaches and fresh cream, Quaker Peaches & Cream Flavour Instant Oatmeal is a delicious start to the morning. Made with 100% whole grain Canadian Oats, this is a part of breakfast time you can feel good about. It cooks in 1 – 2 minutes!

Plus, one packet (33 g) of Quaker Peaches & Cream Flavour Instant Oatmeal supplies 30% of the daily amount of the fibres shown to help reduce cholesterol and is a source of iron.

There’s nothing like waking up to a warm and nourishing bowl of Quaker Instant Oatmeal — made with whole grain Canadian oats.

We love to mix things up, and there are tons of great flavours to explore. Whether you’re into the classic taste of Maple & Brown Sugar Flavour, Apples & Cinnamon, or prefer other flavours, there’s a Quaker Instant Oatmeal recipe for everyone in the family.

Always on the go? Try out our Quaker Instant Oatmeal Cups.

  • MADE WITH CANADIAN OATS — Quaker Instant Oatmeal is proudly made with whole grain oats, so you can feel good about every last bite!
  • AMAZING FLAVOURS – There’s a Quaker Instant Oatmeal recipe for everyone in the family. We love to mix things up, and there are tons of great flavours to explore.

data.title: Quick Oats
data.description:
Don’t let your morning rush stop you from enjoying the benefit of Quaker Oats. Ready in less than 5 minutes, Quaker Quick Oats are perfect for your busy family. Top with fresh fruits, nuts or cinnamon and enjoy all the nutritious benefits. Made with 100% whole grain oats, so you can feel good about every last bite!

Whether you’re looking for a quick and delicious part of your morning that’s ready in minutes or baking up a batch of your favourite oatmeal cookies, Quaker Oats are always there to lend a helping hand. Available in steel-cut, gluten-free, large flake, and one-minute recipes!

As you already know, Quaker Oats aren’t just great for your morning bowl of oatmeal — they’re also a highly versatile baking ingredient that can be used in all kinds of delicious recipes, from cookies to squares, crumbles, and other unexpectedly delicious combinations.

Quaker Oats pair well with all your favourite flavours. Try adding some fresh fruit, yogurt, honey or maple syrup.

  • NO ARTIFICIAL FLAVOURS OR COLOURS —The delicious taste of Quaker Oats provides all the bold flavour you seek.
  • ESSENTIAL BAKING INGREDIENT — If you love to bake, you already know how versatile Quaker Oats are when it comes to amazing cookies, squares, banana breads, and so many more recipes.
  • SOURCE OF FIBRE & IRON — With 30 g of whole grains per serving
  • MADE WITH CANADIAN OATS — So you can feel good about every last bite.
  • A PERFECT PAIRING – Quaker Oats pair well with all your favourite flavours. Try adding some fresh fruit, yogurt, honey or maple syrup and you’ll have yourself delicious oatmeal as part of breakfast time or as a snack that’s ready in no time.

data.title: Purfiltre Partially Skimmed Milk 1%
data.description:
Taste the goodness every day with Lactantia PurFiltre 1% Filtered Partially Skimmed Milk. Sourced from Canadian dairies, every drop of this 100% Canadian milk is carefully filtered to provide a smooth, pure taste that stays fresh longer without preservatives. Source of calcium and protein, this low fat milk also contains vitamins A and D, making it a nutritious and delicious choice for the whole family. A delightful, refreshing choice on its own, with cereal, or in blended coffee drinks. Rediscover the farm-fresh flavour of fine filtered milk. Lactantia, for Milk Connoisseurs!

  • Smooth and delicious filtered milk that stays fresh longer without preservatives
  • 100% Canadian milk from Canadian dairies
  • Reduced fat, partially skimmed milk with 1% M.F.
  • Good source of calcium
  • 9 g of protein per serving
  • Vitamins A & D
  • 2 L

data.title: 2% Ultrafiltered Partly Skimmed Milk
data.description: Neilson. Part of your family since 1893.Neilson Ultrafiltered Partly Skimmed Milk offers a smooth, balanced taste with the power of 18 grams of protein from milk in every 250 mL serving. Made from 100% Canadian milk, it’s crafted using a fine filtration process that concentrates natural protein and reduces lactose. The result is a creamy, satisfying drink enriched with milk protein concentrate and no added sugar.

data.title: Grass Fed 2% Milk
data.description: Rich in nutrients, milk has been a food staple for centuries. Used in cooking, baking or simply as a wholesome beverage, Milk is a great way to get calcium and protein into your diet. Whole milk contains at least 3.25% milk fat. When a portion of the milk’s fat is removed, it becomes partly skimmed milk, such as 2% milk and 1% milk, depending on the quantity removed. Skim milk is virtually fat-free, with only about 0.1% fat.

The †Simple Check™ symbol appears on no name® products made without 10 ingredients such as synthetic colours*, artificial flavours and artificial sweeteners. *As defined in Canadian regulations. To learn more visit noname.ca/simplecheck

name: Almond Milk Alternative, Unsweetened, Dairy Free

data.title: Almond Milk Alternative, Unsweetened, Dairy Free
data.description:
Oh, yes, it is… a mere 30 calories per serving. Enjoy the goodness of Silk® Zero Sugar Original Almond Beverage for less than half the calories of skim milk. Over cereal, in recipes and more, you won’t miss the sugar, and you’ll be delighted by the taste.*Voted most trusted Almond Plant-Based Beverage by Canadian shoppers based on the 2024 BrandSpark® Canadian Trust Study.

  • Vegan
  • Dairy free
  • Absolutely no cholesterol or saturated fat
  • Verified by the Non-GMO Project’s product verification program
  • No artificial colours, flavors or funny business

data.title: Almond Breeze, Original
data.description:
Almond Breeze is a great tasting, no-dairy beverage. It is rich and creamy with a pleasant aftertaste.

Delicious tasting Almond Brezze.

Blue Diamond has been producing almonds since 1910. No one knows them, or loves them, like we do. Our 3000 plus growers are dedicated to producing delicious tasting and nutritious almonds for Almond Breeze..

From the Almond People
